reasoning: Autoimmune urticaria is a subset of chronic urticaria. Chronic urticaria prevalence ~0.1-3% globally. Autoimmune mechanisms account for ~40-50% of chronic urticaria cases. Estimated incidence ~0.5 per 100k; prevalence ~500-1500 per 100k (subset of total chronic urticaria 1000-30000 per 100k).
source: Greaves MW. (2004). Chronic urticaria. J Allergy Clin Immunol. 114(3):465-74
